UX/UI designer (jun+)
–ú–æ—Å–∫–≤–∞, –æ—Ñ–∏—Å

üôÇ –ü—Ä—è–º–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç HR @CathyLomachenko

This vacancy is for a UX/UI design position on the Product team:
‚Äî Our team's main goal is to improve customer experience so that more leads buy, and we do it by improving our website and releasing new features in our web app
‚Äî As a UX/UI designer, you will work with other designers and product managers to design interfaces that help us reach these goals

What you will do:
You‚Äôll work to...
‚Äî Brainstorm ways to improve our CRM software
‚Äî Turn ideas and wireframes into pixel perfect designs in Figma
‚Äî Iterate on existing designs to improve user experience
‚Äî Help continue to develop our design system
‚Äç
Our recent projects:
‚Äî Rebranding (check out kommo.com)
‚Äî New in-app help center and interactive onboarding checklist
‚Äî Empty states in our mobile app
‚Äî New WhatsApp integration
‚Äç
We‚Äôre looking for someone who has:
‚Äî 1+ years of experience designing interfaces
